title: Ticket #352: Test GSI setup needs to have a proxy cert.
description:
In order to test #17 with GSI, I need our tarball that contains all the files needed for a GSI testing environment to include a proxy cert (that is good for many years or whatever). It seems like a big chunk of the GSI code is not exercised unless a proxy is used.

Could a proxy cert (that works w/ the CA certs etc in the tarball) please be added into the tarball attachment on this wiki page? Thanks.
creator: tannenba
